participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily is passionate about her future career as a lawyer. She is friendly and optimistic, often dreaming big.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Caring and practical, Mike is a devoted family man who finds joy in the little things. He is humorous and easy-going, always willing to lend a hand.
participant_2.background: my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. my wife and kids are the best. i'm a plumber.
